name: CONRAD 760
notes:
AKA CONRAD 25.
This yacht, built in Poland, is based, probably, on the last 1/4 ton design by D. Peterson. (prototype was winner of 1/4 ton in 1978). 
They are sailed, raced and seen most often in Eastern Europe and especially Russia.
Dimension are only approximate. 
All boats share the same hull and keel, but deck and rig details vary.
It is said that more than 300 may have been built.
